author: Twentysix (Twentysix#5252)
description: A simple, no frills bansync cog.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing this cog. TL;DR:
If you're admin on server A and server B you can sync bans between them no problem.
If you're only admin on server A, server B will need to whitelist your server for you to pull (and push) bans from/to it.
That's it. See `[p]help Sbansync` and enjoy.
short: A simple, no frills bansync cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
